title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.20 - Port Authority may prohibit aircraft from landing or taking off under certain circumstances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.20 - Port Authority may prohibit aircraft from landing or taking off under certain circumstances

State Regulations

The Port Authority may prohibit aircraft landing and
taking off at any time when, and under any circumstances under which the
manager deems such landings and take-offs likely to endanger persons or
property, except for emergency landings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
